name: Generate Dataset with QA Pairs for RAG Evaluation
description: Generate synthetic question-answer pairs from documents for RAG system evaluation.

generation_model.title: Generation Model (Model to be used for Generation. Select `local` to use the local model running)

generation_model.ui:help: Select the model to be used for generating QA pairs

chunk_size.ui:help: Size of document chunks in characters. Larger chunks provide more context but may lead to longer generation times.

chunk_overlap.ui:help: Number of characters to overlap between chunks to maintain context continuity.

n_generations.ui:help: Number of question-answer pairs to generate. Limited by the number of available document chunks.
